sentences.sentence: Unlike fashion's embrace of playful dissimulation and seduction, this beauty practice instead insists on correcting precisely measured flaws.
sentences.translation: 不像时尚界拥抱好玩的伪装和诱惑，这种美容实践反而坚持纠正精确测量的缺陷。

sentences.sentence: You clearly love Ms. Yu, why don't want dissimulation!
sentences.translation: 您明明爱着羽小姐，为什么非要掩饰呢！

sentences.sentence: The thief intruded into the house with caution and dissimulation.
sentences.translation: 窃贼小心掩饰地潜入室内。
